overview: A punk band decimates Fleetwood Mac, and the Candy Apples spit factory produces enough saliva to saturate the Sahara Desert. More? Tabitha Stevens and Stephanie DuValle stroke-off a 10-story tall alien beast to a 1000-gallon climax, then carpet munch in his galaxian goo
tagline: A close encounter of the sexual kind.
title: Planet X 2
